door ≈ Dach

𒊩 SAL <> 𒍮𒈜 ṣulul Saal

i 32 𒀜𒊒𒊻𒈠 𒌑𒆥 𒋫𒊏𒀭𒋙
i 32 at-ru-uṣ-ma ú-kin ta-ra-an-šú
i 32 at•rise.ma hegen𓀄 Dachran šú (√tarāṣu •stretch )
i 32 I stretched out its covering and (thus) secured its roof .
